text:
If you need something to warm you up this cold weekend, then look no further than this amazing video of the Orange is the New Black cast crashing two fans' wedding.

Australian fans Tegan and Louise were going about their nuptials when the former had a very special surprise in store for her OITNB-loving new wife.

We mean, what better present is there for a super fan than Lea DeLaria – aka Big Boo – popping-up at your nuptials?

This content is imported from Third party. You may be able to find the same content in another format, or you may be able to find more information, at their web site.

After the stars' surprise appearance, it got even better as Lea brought along co-stars Danielle Brooks and Aussie Yael Stone – Taystee and Morello, respectively.

"As an Australian, we've waited a long time for this to happen," Yael told the happy couple and gathered guests.

"And we're really, really proud that we can be here and celebrate you guys individually and celebrate this change across this beautiful country that needed to change. This is a beautiful moment and thank you for sharing it with us!"

Netflix

Lea later showed-off her amazing singing voice by doing a romantic rendition of Ella Fitzgerald's 'Taking a Chance on Love' for the newlyweds. Be still our beating hearts.

The trio are in the country for Sydney's Gay and Lesbian Mardi Gras alongside other cast members of the popular Netflix show.

Orange is the New Black is due to return for its sixth season later this year. Here's everything you need to know about that.

authors: Sam Warner Is Digital Spy S Freelance News Reporter.
